=== User Day Instructor Blurb ===

Nathan Handler, an up-and-coming Chicago native, is a member of many respected teams in the Ubuntu communtiy. He is also currently serving as a member of the Ubuntu Beginners Team Council and MOTU Council. In addition to being a freenode staff member, he has recently been chosen to serve on the Ubuntu IRC Council. Nathan will be sharing some of his knowledge with us as he teaches us about using IRC.
